spiritsExplanation:
The workout is a Pilates session focused on core activation, indicated by phrases like "ignite your core" and "Pilates." This suggests a "Flow & Rhythm" spirit as Pilates typically emphasizes smooth and controlled movements, mind-body connection, and coordination, supported by the energetic dance and global hits music playlist.

The image reveals the session taking place outdoors, enhancing a connection to nature, which justifies the inclusion of "Outdoor & Adventure" despite the technical Pilates format. This outdoor setting significantly reinforces the "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit.

The 10-minute duration also aligns with these spirits, providing a concise session that prioritizes rhythm and flow without leaning into more structured, intense, or restorative categories. The absence of specific sports context or recovery focus excludes spirits like "Sport & Agility" or "Soothing & Restorative."
